Indicate means and route of travel to interior) Alien has been advised of communication privileges pursuant to 8 CFR 242.2(e). Initial jec Date 09-30-88 MONEY NONE BAGGAGE: LARGE PURSE Subject Herminia RODRIGUEZ-Sanchez openely admits to being a citizen and native of Honduras illegally in the United States. Subject also admits to have entered the United States at a place not designated as a Port of Entry, thereby evading inspection by Immigration Officers on 09-30-88, about 5 miles west of the San Ysidro Port of Entry. Subject claims that she left San Pedro Sola Honduras, with her grandson FOIA (b)(6) and traveled by commercial busline until reaching Tijuana B.C. Mexico 09-29-88. Subject claims to have entered into Mexico illegally without a passport or permit. Subject claims that no arrangements were made with anyone to be smuggled into the United States and that her sole purpose in coming to the United States was to give her grandson a better life. Subject intended to reside with her grandaughter who resides in Los Angelas California. Subject had in her possession a telephone number where she was to contact her grandaughter FOIA (b)(6) the residence address is unknown.
